description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/01083/FUL: external materials (3), rooftop plan (4), surfacing materials (5), enclosure (6), cycle and refuse storage (8), landscaping (9), tree protection (10), infrastructure utilities (11), tree replacement (12), bat and bird boxes (13), updated eco report (14), potable water (18) and SuDS (19) in respect of redevelopment of site by the erection of a detached single-storey, 3-bed dwelling house with associated hardstanding and refuse storage.
